name: ARMv7LockFree
short_description: This project contains a set of lock-free algorithms and supporting files for the ARMv7 architecture, such as the Cortex-A9. These algorithms use the ARMv7 LDREX/STREX instructions. A lock-free data structure can be shared by threads running on different cores in a multi-processor system, or running at different priority levels on a single core system, without disabling interrupts or locking the bus. The algorithms include a macro to make any operation on a single variable atomic, a mult-writer-multi-reader FIFO, and a multi-writer-multi-reader linked list queue.
summary: Lock-free data structures for the ARMv7 architecture
